
{{alias}}( value )
    Tests if a value is generator object-like.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether value is generator object-like.

    Examples
    --------
    > var obj = {
    ...     'next': function noop() {},
	...     'return': function noop() {},
	...     'throw': function noop() {}
    ... };
    > var bool = {{alias}}( obj )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}( {} )
    false
    > bool = {{alias}}( null )
    false

    See Also
    --------
